subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hours after the Heat signed Goran Dragic, the team learned that Chris Bosh was undergoing tests on his lungs, an unfortunate turn for the successful outfit Pat Riley has built in Miami.
snippet: Hours after the Heat signed Goran Dragic, the team learned that Chris Bosh was undergoing tests on his lungs, an unfortunate turn for the successful outfit Pat Riley has built in Miami.
